title: What technologies were stolen from Nazi Germany? - Quora

response.answer_text: “To the victor go the spoils,” so “stolen” is not the applicable word. Appropriation is the correct word to use here or recovered or discovered. Therefore, we appropriated Germanys Jet engine technology, Intercontinental missile rocketry systems, including guidance systems, their nuclear weapons progress, their chemical warfare developments, especially poison gas, the results of their scienctific medical discoveries as they conducted on prisoners and kept copious records, their advanced artillery developments, aviation research beyond the jet engine and Bayer aspirin.

None that I am aware of. After Nazi Germany had launched a disastrous war of aggression with many millions of people needlessly killed and many more made homeless, they lost the rights to their intellectual properties. They were a criminal state and they were punished. That has been the common practice in international relations for millennia.
